info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 9 at 11:20AM EDT until May 11 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Binghamton NY
info.description:
...The National Weather Service in Binghamton NY has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in New York...Pennsylvania...
Susquehanna River At Conklin affecting Broome and Susquehanna Counties.
Susquehanna River At Vestal affecting Broome and Tioga Counties.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Susquehanna River at Conklin.
* WHEN...From late tonight to Sunday evening.
* IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, Flood stage. Alta, River and Lawrence Roads closed in the Town of Conklin due to minor flooding. No homes are flooded at this river stage. Valley park in Kirkwood takes on water.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:00 AM EDT Friday the stage was 9.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tonight to a crest of 12.4 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - https://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas.
Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
The next statement will be issued this evening at 1100 PM EDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO SUNDAY EVENING
